direction: Serena walks in, a girl watches her and takes a photo with her cell phone

line: Hey Upper East Siders, Gossip Girl here... and I have the biggest news ever. One of my many sources, Melanie91, sends us this: Spotted at Grand Central, bags in hand: Serena van der Woodsen. Was it only a year ago our It-Girl mysteriously disappeared for quote 'boarding school'? And just as suddenly she's back. Don't believe me? See for yourselves: Lucky for us, Melanie91 sent proof. Thanks for the photo, Mel!

Let's go home. I'm cooking. Caprese salad with a little mozzarella di Bufala... yeah, I'm gonna make you guys...

line: I love you. Nate Archibald. Always have, always will.

line: Serena van der Woodsen? Is that you?
Serena is at school. Kiss me.
No, I think I heard your mom say she's here. Don't you wanna go say hey?

Serena is walking through the party guest who start talking behind her back

line: ...I heard she is pregnant... rehab... she looks good...

line: So I told him: Forget it, I don't care if it's mahogany. It clashes with my sofa.
So, were is he? What, they haven't let him out yet?
Let's not discuss this right now, ok? I thought you might want to see some of your friends.

direction: Serena notices Nate on the other side of the room, Blair opens her bedroom door and walks into the room, blocking Nate from Serena's view, Serena and Blair hug

line: Hi, Serena, so good to see you.
Come, we're about to have dinner.
I'll set a place for you at the table next to Blair.
Yeah, actually... there's somewhere I have to go.
Yeah, I just… I don't feel well. I just wanted to come by and say hi. I'll see you at school tomorrow.
School… so I guess she's back for good.
Didn't you know she was coming?
Course I did. I just… wanted it to be a surprise.
Word is that S bailed on B's party in under 90 seconds and didn't even have one lemochello. Has our bad girl really gone good? Or is it all just part of the act?

direction: Serena walks in, passes the nurse's station and looks into a patient's room

line: Young lady, you can't be here. Visiting hours are over.

direction: Dan is looking at the blog of 'Gossip Girl'

line: Why'd she leave? Why'd she return? Send me all the deets. And who am I? That's one secret I'll never tell. you know you love me. XOXO Gossip Girl.

line: Erik, I know I've been a terrible sister. I'm so happy to see you.
Must be a lot of rumours why you're back.
Yeah, but none of them mentioned you.
What do I want, baby? For Serena sleeping in her own bed, possibly wearing pajamas.
Morning, mom. Hey, I was just about to ask the doctor if I could take Erik to breakfast. Wanna come?
Ehm, I think what I'll do is to get him a croissant down the street.

direction: Lily leaves the room, Serena storms after her

line: Let me guess: You told everyone Erik is just visiting grandpa in Rhode Island.
So, you're actually hiding him. He tries to take his own life and you're worried it will cost you 'Mom Of The Year'?
Serena, you've been gone. Doing who knows what with god knows who...
I told you, boarding school was not like that.
As happy as I am to have you home, you have no idea what it's been like.

direction: Serena walks up to the front entrance, Nate is already waiting for her

line: Oh, hey! Uhm, your mom told me you guys are staying here at The Palace.
Yeah, we're renovating... again. You know my mom: If it's not broke, break it. So what are you doing here?
Oh, I just wanted to see how you were. You seemed kind of upset last night.
I got to get going and change for school. I'm gonna be late.
I didn't come back for you. Look, Blair's my best friend and you're her boyfriend, and she loves you. That's the way things are supposed to be.

direction: Dan runs across the street to catch his bus to school
Chuck and Nate are sitting next to each other, Dan is standing in the alley

line: Serena looked effing hot last night. There's something wrong with that level of perfection... it needs to be violated.
And yet you know I'm right. You're telling me if you had the chance...
You guys have been dating since kindergarten and you haven't sealed the deal.

direction: Chuck signals Nate that they have arrived at school
They get up, Dan is standing behind them, Chuck turns to Dan

line: No, I... I go to your school. Identical uniforms, that's kind of a tip-off?

direction: Chuck and Nate leave the bus, Dan talks to himself

line: So you guys wanna sit together at lunch?

direction: Blair, Isabel, and Katy are sitting on the steps looking at the invitations. Jenny is standing next to them

line: So cute! They should be framed or something.
Not bad work. And here is yours... as promised.

direction: Blair hands Jenny one of the invitations
Serena walks up to them, eating yoghurt

line: Hey, here you guys are. I looked all over the dining hall for you.

direction: Serena notices Jenny and shakes her hand

line: I know, uhm, I mean, hi, I'm Jenny.

direction: Serena picks up one of the invitations

line: Saturday. And you're kinda not invited. Since until 12 hours ago everyone thought you were at boarding school. And Jenny used up all the invites.
No, it's ok. I've got a lot of stuff to do anyway.

direction: Serena throws the invitation onto the steps

line: Well, we should get going then. Unless you want us to wait for you. Looks like you got a lot of yoghurt left.

direction: Blair, Isabel, and Katy walk away. Serena turns around

line: Blair, think we can meet tonight?
I'd love to, but I'm doing something with Nate tonight.
The Palace, 8 o'clock. Nate will wait.
Spotted: At the steps of the Met, an S and B power struggle.
I can probably do a half hour.
Did S think she could waltz home and things would be just like they were?
Did B think S would go down without a fight? Or can these two hotties work it out? There's nothing 'Gossip Girl' likes more than a good catfight. And this could be a classic.

direction: Rufus is putting up flyers for a concert of his band 'Lincoln Hawk', Dan is with him

line: Uh, you know... you know, dad, there's this thing called 'myspace' where you post all this information online. Save some trees, have a blog.
Maybe if musicians would get off their blogs and picked up their guitars then music business would be in better shape.

direction: Dan's cell phone rings, he takes a look at the new text message: Jenny (Mobile), Sep 24, 2007, 3:15:23 PM, HELP: EMERGENCY. 712 5TH AVE.

line: Hey, dad, listen, uhm, I got to run. You'll be ok?
Yeah. You'll mom will be back. She's always been a free spirit. That's one of the reasons I fell for her in the first place.
Luckily, staple guns are old-school. Go, I'm gonna be fine.
I talked to the nurse and I'm kidnapping you.
We're going to Wendells... just for an hour though, I swear. I had a really bad day.
Really? 'Cause I had a great day: A couple of pills, bunch of Rorschach tests... they had this green jelly for lunch.
Mmh, yummy! Why didn't you save me any? Come on, we need to get you out of here before mom shows up.

direction: Dan walks up to Jenny who's trying on a red dress

line: Jenny, what is it? What is wrong?
Do you like this on me?
Wait... wait a second, is that why you needed me? I thought this was an emergency.
A fashion emergency. I mean, come on, I've never been to a big dance before.
Yeah, but mom's gone and dad's allergic to department stores.
Well, you look good, Jen. You do, really.
Thanks. I'm mean, too bad it's more than our rent but I think I can sew something like it.

direction: Jenny notices Serena and Erik walking towards them

line: Oh my gosh, it's Serena. Hi, Serena!

direction: Jenny takes an invitation adressed to 'Serena van der Woodsen' out of her bag, Dan panics and vanishes

line: Stylist and personal shopper. Erik, hi.
Hi, uhm, this is my brother... or...

direction: Jenny gestures behind her, notices Dan is gone, Dan is hiding behind a rack of dresses, watching Serena

line: So is this your dress for the 'Kiss On The Lips' party?
Here, I made you one during free period but anyone asks where you got it, I know nothing.
Jenny, that dress would look even better in black.

direction: Chuck and Nate are taking a walk, smoking a Joint

line: Yeah, I'm gonna need it. Blair's mom's at the country house.
Yeah? Then maybe I should swipe some of my dad's viagra? Or my mom's paxils? Nathaniel, you're finally about to have sex with your girlfriend. It's like you're heading to your execution.
Talk to Chuck, buddy. You and Blair have been dating forever, all of a sudden there is a problem?
There is no problem. It's just... do you ever feel like our whole lives have been planned out for us? That we're just gonna... end up like our parents?
You know, aren't we entitled to choose... just to be happy?

Look, easy, Socrates. What we're entitled to is a trust fund... maybe a house in the Hamptons, a prescription drug problem. Happiness does not seem to be on the menu. So smoke up and seal the deal with Blair... 'cause you're also entitled to tab that ass.

direction: Serena and Blair are sitting at the bar, Blair is drinking a Martini

line: So, how's your mom doing... with the divorce and everything?
Great. So my dad left her for another man. She's lost 15 pounds, got an eye-lift. It's been good for her.
Yeah, I could tell since you didn't call or write the entire time it was happening.
No, I know... I was just... boarding school... it's like...

I don't even know why you went to boarding school to begin with. Do you know how it felt, calling your house when you didn't show up at school and having your mom say: Serena didn't tell you that she moved to Connecticut?
I just... I had to go. I needed to get away from everything. Please just trust me.
How can I trust you when I feel like I don't even know you.
Let's fix that. I saw you at school with Katy and Is and I get it. I don't want to take any of that away from you. I just...
Because it's just yours to take if you want it?

No, that's not what I mean. I... I miss you. I just want things to go back to the way they used to be. You know, walking to school togheter, dancing on tables at Bungalow, the nights when we were at your mom's country house. You were like my sister... and with our families... we need each other.
Well, you missed some classic Eleanor Waldorf melt-downs. If it wasn't such a tragedy it would have been funny. Actually kinda was.
Well, I wish I could have been there.
You are now. I have to meet Nate. I kind of have something special and...
Well, I don't want to keep you but...
Spotted: At The Palace Hotel, S and B having a heart to heart.

direction: Serena takes Blair's left over Martini and empties it in one gulp

line: Hmm, why so thirsty, S? You may have won over B for now but we still think you're hiding something.

direction: Jenny is sitting at the sewing machine, Dan enters

line: Ah, the invisible man returns. You know, I really had no idea you could move that fast.
Yeah, well, your fashion emergency was solved, so... I figured my work was done.
Come on, Dan. Serena said hi to you at her 9th grade birthday party and you've never forgotten it.
How could I? She was the only person who spoke to me. And I'm pretty sure she thought I was someone else.
Well, you know, she is actually nice. And if she did know you I think she would really like you.
I don't know, I think she would be a tad overwhelmed by the glitz and the glamour of the Humphrey lifestyle.
Well, I heard she's living at The Palace Hotel.

Probably sitting at the bar by herself, sipping Martinis... all alone. You know, it's actually kinda sad. Oh, and dad's at the gallery working late. He left money for dinner, so I was thinking Indian.
You know... you know what, I think I'm... I'm gonna go out.
Ok... good, 'cause I already ordered and only got enough for one.

direction: Chuck enters, shoves some women aside
Chuck walks over to Serena who is having another Martini

line: I love this town. I'm going to have to tell my parents the hotel they just bought is serving minors.
And if you get a drink they are also serving pigs.
I love it when you talk dirty.
You just love when a girl talks to you.
Actually, I prefer them when they're not talking.
Oh, I've missed your witty banter.
Let's catch up. Take our clothes off, stare at each other.
What about I just get a bit to eat. I've been drinking on an empty stomach.
I heard you didn't do that anymore.
Well, what about a grilled cheese with truffle oil? You do love truffels?
Enough to know it's not on the menue.

direction: The room is lit by candles, Nate enters, Blair is waiting for him in lingerie

line: Is it too much? I wanted it to be special.

direction: Blair kisses Nate but he pulls away

line: Look, I don't know how to say this... or if it's even the right thing to do but ehm... there's something I need to tell you.

direction: Chuck puts a bundle of Dollar bills into the jacket of the chef, Alfonso and his staff leave

line: Alfonso, you're stud. Now have good night, we're closing the kitchen early.
Oh my god, this is so good.
Well, if you're looking for a way to thank me I've got a couple ideas.

direction: Chuck touches Serena's thigh and leans in on her

line: This is... this is not happening right now.
You're worried Nate will find out?
Last year... the Sheperd wedding... think I don't know why you left town?

direction: FLASHBACK - ONE YEAR AGO - INT BAR - Serena is dancing on the bar, holding a bottle of champagne, Nate tries to stop her

line: Serena, you are not supposed to be here.
Oh well, if the happy couple didn't want to put up a catch for the bar they should let me be where I want to be. Move!
I can do it, I can open it. Let me show you... here, come here. Let me see...

direction: They both pull on the bottle until it opens with a loud bang

line: It's ok. You're stronger than me, alright.
Look at you, you're a mess.

direction: Serena and Nate are about to kiss
Nate turns his face away from Blair

line: But... that was it... you guys kissed.

direction: FLASHBACK - ONE YEAR AGO - INT BAR - Serena and Nate make out heavily, undressing each other, Chuck watches from the balcony

line: Best friend and the boyfriend. That's pretty classy, S. I think you're more like me than you admit.
No, no, that... that was then. I'm trying to change.

direction: Chuck tries to kiss Serena, she pushes him away

line: Stop it. Stop! No! Stop it!

direction: FLASHBACK - ONE YEAR AGO - INT BAR - Serena and Nate are having sex, Serena is gasping loudly

line: I knew it! I always knew there was something! Get out!

direction: FLASHBACK - ONE YEAR AGO - INT BAR - Serena is sitting on top of Nate, riding him
Chuck violenty tries to kiss Serena
FLASHBACK - ONE YEAR AGO - INT BAR - Serena and Nate make out heavily
Blair falls onto her bed and starts crying
FLASHBACK - ONE YEAR AGO - INT BAR - Nate kisses Serena's breasts
Chuck is still trying to kiss Serena
Serena kicks Chuck between the legs and storms off
Dan looks around the bar for Serena, she enters the bar and crashes into him, her purse flies to the ground, Dan helps her to pick up her things

line: I'm... so sorry, Are you ok?

direction: Serena takes her purse and runs off, Dan finds her cell phone on the floor and tries to tell Serena but she is already gone

line: And just when B and S had built a bridge... it all had to come crashing down. But dry your eyes: the 'Kiss On The Lips' party is around the corner. And you know who loves parties? Gossip Girl.

direction: Nate and his father are having a race, Howie wins

line: You seem upbeat this morning. Did you have fun with Blair last night?
Actually, we got into a pretty big fight.
You want my advice? Apologise. Even if it was her fault. Flowers, maybe some jewellery if she's really upset. Always works for your mother.
I don't know. I think it may be for the best.
Wait a minute, you guys broke up?
I know. But I'm just not sure if she's the girl for me.
But you guys have been dating since kindergarden.
I mean, you love her, don't you?
Yes, I do. I just think it might be good for us to take a break, you know.
Maybe not right now. Eleanor Waldorf is gearing up to take her company public and I've been cording her for month to let me handle the deal.
I will get it... if you just help me out a little bit.

direction: Nate looks at his father in disbelief

line: What? You love her, she loves you. It's just a rough patch, that's all. You don't give up just because things are hard. Not in business or if your family is depending on you.

direction: Dan is standing at the reception talking to the Concierge who is holding Serena's cell phone

line: How did you know it was Miss van der Woodsen if you didn't read it and if you are not a guest at the hotel what were you doing there?
What? Uhm, look, when Prince Charming found Cinderella's slipper they didn't accuse him of having a foot-fetish.
And you are Prince Charming? Well, there is Miss van der Woodsen now...

direction: Serena turns around and walks over to the reception

line: Do you know this young man?
She doesn't know me. Nobody knows me. It's cool, it's fine.
Uhm, from last night, right? I'm sorry about that.

direction: Dan turns back to the Concierge

line: Well, he claims he found your cell phone.

direction: Lily walks over, carrying a cloth bag

line: Guess what I found for you... a dress for 'Kiss On The Lips'. I saw the invitation on the nightstand.
Oh, uhm, I'm not going to that.
What do you mean? Blair's throwing it.
Yeah, uhm... see the problem is I... by the time I got the invitation... I uhm, actually already had plans.
Eh, yeah, hi, nice to meet you Misses van der Woodsen. I'm Dan... Humphrey.
What are you and Dan Humphrey doing?

direction: Dan shows Lily a flyer for his dad's concert

line: Eh, we're going to a concert tonight.
Yeah, 'Rolling Stone' named them one of the 'Top 10 Forgotten Bands Of The '90s'.
Well, this party would have been the perfect opportunity for you to announce your return but I guess I'll just keep the dress for myself.
Yeah, no, I... it's not a problem, really.
So pick me up at eight?
You really go out with some guy you don't know?
Well, you can't be worse than the guys I do know.

direction: Blair and Nate are having dinner

line: Thanks for meeting me. Look, Blair, I really hurt you and I know that and I want to fix it.
Really? And how are you gonna do that?
I'm gonna put everything in the past. I'm not gonna see Serena again or even talk to her. It'll be like she doesn't exist.
I think that's a good idea. Let's not mention it again. You gonna eat that?

direction: Blair picks up a piece of sushi from Nate's plate

line: That's it? 'Cause you were pretty upset last night... I mean, should we talk about this?

There is nothing to talk about. I overreacted... you say it's in the past, it's in the past. I'm sure you have no feelings for her anymore. I just feel bad for Serena... she'll really miss you. What time does the limo come?

direction: Rufus is working, Lily walks in

line: Lily! Are you shopping for some more art to match your furniture?
Why is my dauthter going to one of your concerts?
Dan's got a date with Serena?
Well, your kids were about to meet, it's a small island.
You're sure it's not some ploy your using my daughter to get to me? Now that your wife left you?
How do you know about Alison?
Oh, I get it: You hear about Alison, use your daughter as an excuse to start something.
Well, you are in my dreams, Lily... and one of them particular occurs finding you in the back of a Nine Inch Nails bus with your shoes in your earrings and Trent Reznor... oh, that happened!
No need to rehash details of decades pass. So I moved on.
Yeah, from Chanterlane to Paris until you switched up rock stars for billionaires.
You think you're so cute. Washed up band, crappy so-called 'art gallery'.
Well, not all of us have settlements from mulitple divorcés to sustain us.
Just stay out of my life, Rufus!

direction: Jenny and Dan are standing in front of a mirror, getting ready to go out

line: You're going out with Serena and I'm going to 'Kiss On The Lips'. Who said this family wasn't cool.
Well, listen, I don't want to be late but you're looking great.

direction: Dan leaves, Rufus comes home, they pass in the hallway

line: See you at the concert, right dad.
I, uhm... ok. [Rufus sees Jenny and walks over to her]
Oh my god, my daughter is a woman.
Dad, you could just tell me I look nice instead of turning this into a sermon on the passage of time.

direction: Blair is looking at herself in a full-length mirror, she's wearing a brown dress, Eleanor enters

line: Blair. let me see how it looks! Why are you wearing that one? Didn't you see the dress I left on the bed?
This one is not as elegant a choice as that one.
Why do you care so much?
Because I love you. Blair, you will never be more beautiful or thin or happy than you are right now. I just want you to make the most of it.
I guess I have time to change.
And put some product in your hair. The ends are dry.

direction: Blair, Nate, Chuck, Isabel and Katy are laughing and drinking champagne
Dan enters and sees Serena standing on the gallery, they look at each other and smile
Chuck, Isabel and Katy are standing at the bar, Chuck spots Jenny in the crowd

line: Mmh... till you're done with her.
I know, uhm, I mean, hi, I'm Jenny.
Looks like little Jen might end up with a new boy and a ticket to the inner circle. Or will C end up with another victim? I told you I love parties.

direction: Serena and Dan are walking down the street towards the back entrance of a club, the band is unloading their equipment

line: So I'm a little overdressed, aren't I?
Honestly, I don't really have a problem with your appearance. Hey, come on, I want you to meet one of the guys in the band.
Serena, I'd like you to meet Rufus Humphrey. Dad, this is Serena.
Serena van der Woodsen. Oh, I don't know how I know that. Nice to meet you.
You guys are a little early. It's gonna be a while before we take the stage.
Yeah, I may have slightly overbudgeted it for travel time.

direction: One of Rufus' bandmates holds Rufus' guitar into the air

line: I should go tune that. Excuse me. Enjoy the show! Son, talk to you later.
So you took me to meet your dad on our first date?
So this... this is a date? Ah, maybe I should have worn my loafers then... and dress down a little bit.
Let's go and talk some in private.

direction: They stop in the empty stairway

line: This is definitely quieter but do you actually know where we're going or...

direction: Chuck leans in to kiss Jenny but she pulls away

line: So, you said you wanted to talk. Uhm, what do you want to talk about?

direction: Chuck starts kissing Jenny but after a few moments she pulls away again

line: Ok, I am sorry. If you don't want to do anything that's cool. Let's start over.
Yeah, uhm... do you wanna start over back at the party?
Eh... have a glass of champagne, please?

direction: While Chuck pours a glass of champagne, Jenny takes out her cell phone and starts texting
Serena and Dan leave the club, Dan holds the door open for her

line: Sorry, nothing, nothing. I just, uhm... my sister was right: You're nice.
You asked my out on a date and you didn't think I was nice?
No, uh... I just thought you were hot. And technically, you asked me out.
Oh, ok, ok, I see. So, uhm, sensible tortured soul boy is actually kind of superficial.

direction: Dan's cell phone rings, he takes a look at the new text message: Jenny (Mobile), Sep 25, 2007, 9:15:05 PM, HELP. EMERGENCY. NEED YOU, J.
Dan gets another text message: Jenny (Mobile), Sep 25, 2007, 9:15:44 PM, 911, 4 REAL PLEASE. U KNOW Chuck?

line: No, it's my sister. She's at that 'Kiss On The Lips' party, you know. She's having some problems with that guy Chuck. I'm sorry, I have to go.
No, no, listen, if it's Chuck it's not ok.
I'm gonna do a lap, ok? Look for her.

direction: The guests notice Serena and start gossiping

line: ... Serena... it's Serena... oh my gosh... is she really here?... is that really her?... Blair said she wasn't invited... she is wasted... she is so brave...

direction: Isabel and Katy both get new text messages

line: What is she doing here? She wasn't invited.

direction: Blair makes her way through the crowd towards Serena but Nate stops her

line: Blair, come on, are you really gonna kick her out?
What? No! God! I told you.
I was going for a walk.

direction: Nate passes Serena without looking at her, Serena turns around and stares at Blair
Chuck tries to kiss Jenny against her will

line: No, I haven't seen here anywhere.
There isn't going to be anybody up here. This is pointless.

direction: Serena finds a scarf on the floor
Chuck is still trying to kiss Jenny, Dan runs over to them
Chuck lets Jenny go, Dan hugs her
Dan walks over to Chuck who pushes him away

line: What the hell is your problem? It's a party. Things happen. Who are you anyway?
How many times do I have to tell you? I'm in your class. My name is Dan Humphrey... and that is my little sister.

direction: Dan punches Chuck in the face, Chuck's nose is bleeding

line: Let's go. come on. [Serena pushes Chuck]
Chuck, don't you ever touch her again!
Hey, you're life is over, slut! Don't forget: I know everything!

direction: Blair watches Serena, Dan and Jenny leaving

line: Yeah, I will be. Just take me home, ok?
So, think I've got a shot at a second date?
Well, I don't think we can top this one.
True, we talk about it in the cab.

direction: They get into the cab, Nate watches them leave, Blair and Chuck stand outside too

line: She better not show her face again.

direction: Dan hugs Jenny, then looks at Serena who smiles at him, Serena turns and looks out of the side window

line: Spotted: Serena... making an heroic exit from B's party. Too bad for her there's school on Monday. So, until next time. You know you love me... Gossip Girl.
